name: Armoured Alliance
description: Control a tank in this realtime action strategy battle to capture all the bases. Use overpowered turrets to destroy your enemies by yourself or as a team.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: FirePro GL 1gb Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Yes Additional Notes: Will not work on Intel Integrated Graphics, requires OpenGL 3.2 support
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
